introduction:
I'm a software developer and digital designer
I enjoy doing weird projects and learning new stuff
aboutMe: Hello! My name is Van Nam "Alex" Doan. I'm currently based in Ontario, Canada.

After a decade of freelance designing and getting my advanced diploma in Computer Science, I became fascinated by the amazing world that is the internet after realizing the expressive potential of the medium. I'd then decided to follow my passion to enrich this massive library of virtual content.
My main focus is creating responsive, fast and smooth interactive digital experiences. I am currently looking for new opportunities. Don't hesitate to contact me at:
